response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. Given its immense worth to both parties, we propose a transaction price of $1,200,000. We believe this offer strikes a fair balance between our interests and provides you with an outstanding value for your investment. Should you find this proposal agreeable, please let us know, and we will proceed with the necessary arrangements promptly. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 1200000}
